==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Rose}}
[[File:Rosa_sp.147.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|薔薇}} (''bara'', ''shōbi'', ''sōbi''): a '''{{l|en|rose}}'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|sort=はら'|yomi=irr}}
From {{m|ja|茨|tr=ibara||bramble, briar}}, itself an alteration from earlier reading ''ubara'' of the same meaning. The reading ''mubara'' appears in {{w|Heian period}} sources, but ''ubara'' is older.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The kanji is {{juku|sort=はら'}}, from {{der|ja|zh|薔薇}}.

====Alternative forms====
* {{sense|bramble}} {{l|ja|荊棘}}
* {{sense|rose}} {{l|ja|バラ}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|ばら|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ばら|バラ}}

# any {{l|en|shrub}} with {{l|en|thorn}}s: a {{l|en|bramble}}, a {{l|en|briar}}
# a {{l|en|thorny}} {{l|en|flower}} of the {{l|en|genus}} ''[[Rosa]]'': a {{l|en|rose}}

=====Usage notes=====
{{U:ja:biology|バラ}}

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-r|薔薇%園|ばら%えん}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|び|yomi=o}}
{{IPAchar|/sʲaubi/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕʲɔːbi/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕoːbi/}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|薔薇|tr={{IPAchar|/d͡zɨɐŋ mˠiɪ/}}|lit=wild rose + kind of fern}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しょうび|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょうび|hhira=しやうび}}

# a {{l|en|thorny}} {{l|en|flower}} of the {{l|en|genus}} ''[[Rosa]]'': a {{l|en|rose}}
# a {{l|en|color}} {{l|en|scheme}} for {{m|ja|襲|tr=kasane|pos=literally “{{l|en|layering}}”, a {{l|en|traditional}} style of layering {{l|en|robe}}s or {{l|en|kimono}}}}, with {{l|en|crimson}} for the outer layer and {{l|en|purple}} for the inner layer

=====Usage notes=====
For the {{m|en|rose}} sense, the ''bara'' reading above is most common.

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|そう|び|yomi=o}}
{{IPAchar|/saubi/}} → {{IPAchar|/sɔːbi/}} → {{IPAchar|/soːbi/}}

Uses the [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading of ''sō'' for the first character, and the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading of ''bi'' for the second character. Appears to be a shift in reading from ''shōbi'' above.<ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|そうび|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|そうび|hhira=さうび}}

# a {{l|en|thorny}} {{l|en|flower}} of the {{l|en|genus}} ''[[Rosa]]'': a {{l|en|rose}}
# a {{l|en|color}} {{l|en|scheme}} for {{m|ja|襲|tr=kasane|pos=literally “{{l|en|layering}}”, a {{l|en|traditional}} style of layering {{l|en|robe}}s or {{l|en|kimono}}}}, with {{l|en|crimson}} for the outer layer and {{l|en|purple}} for the inner layer

=====Usage notes=====
For the {{m|en|rose}} sense, the ''bara'' reading above is most common.
